title: Bootstraping rust fails trying to link to non-existent libc++
body:
```

"gcc_s" "-l" "c" "-l" "m" "-l" "rt" "-shared" "-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/" "-Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-l" "compiler-rt"
note: /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lc++
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

however configure correctly detects it needs to use stdc++:

```
configure: note, user-provided CC looks like clang; CC=clang.
configure: 
configure: CFG_USING_CLANG      := 1 
configure: CFG_CC               := clang 
configure: CFG_CXX              := clang++ 
configure: CFG_STDCPP_NAME      := stdc++ 
configure: CFG_PERF_WITH_LOGFD  := 1 
```
